::Battera::

She flew behind CyberShark.  She hoped that she was flying far enough 
behid so he wouldn't notice her there.  She wanted to be a help, not 
in the way.  She kept him in eye sight.  If he moved and she lost 
him, she could use her sonar and track him that way.
